Five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in 
Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry 
and any two (2) subjects from:  
Biology/Agricultural Science   
Technical Drawing,  
Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,  
Auto Mechanics,  
Metal Work,  
Woodwork (for Civil Engineering Tech.),  
Further Mathematics  
English Language,  
Geography,  
Economics/Commerce.  
For Marine Engineering and Industrial  
Safety & Environmental Engineering. 
‘O’ level pass in Biology is required. At 
least ‘O’ level credit pa ss in English 
Language is required.  
  
Mathematics, physics, 
Chemistry.  
  
a) IMO-POLY and SARO -WIWA POLY require ‘O’ 
level credit pass in English Language.  
b) GIWAPOLY does not insist on credit passes at two  
(2) sittings.  
c) MAPOLY accepts a pass in English Language.  
d) FEDPOFFA accepts English Language 
Economics, Biology, Agricultural Science as part of 
the five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes.  
e) YABATECH requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes 
in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, 
Chemistry and any one (1) from  
Technical Drawing, Basic Electronics or Further 
Mathematics, Agricultural Science, Applied  
Electricity, Biology.  
f) IBD-POLY requir es ‘O’ level credit passes in 
Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and English 
Language.  
g) PLS-POLY requires ‘O’ level credit passes in 
English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any 
one (1) from Chemistry, Biology/Agric. Sci and  
Technical Drawing  
h) IGBAJO requi res five (5) credit passes in 
Mathematics, English Language, Physics and any 
other two (2) subjects from the following: Basic 
Electricity, Biology/Agriculture, Chemistry and 
Technical Drawing.  
i) KAD-POLY requires Mathematics and any two (2) 
subjects from Physics, Chemistry/Technical 
Drawing as UTME subjects.  
j) KWAPOLY accepts ‘O’ level credit passes in 
Alternative to Mechanics, Fine Art, Domestic and  
Industrial Installation, Cable Joining, Winding  of 
Electrical Machine, Radio Communication, 
Television, Electronic Devise and Circuit, 
Mechanical/ Pneumatic Instrument,  
Electrical/Electronics, Instrument, Regulation and 
Installation, Electric Servicing and Circulation, 
Radio, Television and Electric S ervicing, Direct 
Current, Alternate Current and Basic Electricity.  
k) RUGIPO accepts a pass in English Language.  
l) FEDPO-ILA requires ‘O’ level credit passes in  
 English  Language,  Mathematics,  Physics,
